tribe_name: Red Cliff Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians of Wisconsin

awards.recipient_name_raw: RED CLIFF BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA INDIANS OF WISCONSIN
RED CLIFF BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA INDIANS OF WISCONSIN
RED CLIFF BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA INDIANS OF WISCONSIN
awards.description: THE PURPOSE OF THIS PROJECT IS FOR THE RED CLIFF BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA  TO CHARACTERIZE AND ADDRESS AIR QUALITY CONCERNS. THE AIR QUALITY SPECIALIST WILL EXPAND EXPERTISE THROUGH AIR QUALITY TRAINING, DEVELOPING QUALITY ASSURANCE PROTOCOLS FOR DATA COLLECTION, AND PERFORMING AIR QUALITY ASSESSMENTS.  ADDITIONALLY, THE AIR QUALITY SPECIALIST WILL CONDUCT A PARTICULATE MATTER (PM) SENSOR STUDIES ON THE RESERVATION TO DETERMINE THE SOURCE OF THE AIR QUALITY POLLUTION.

awards.recipient_name_raw: RED CLIFF BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA INDIANS OF WISCONSIN
awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:
THE PURPOSE OF THIS GRANT IS TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE RED CLIFF BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA IN ITS EFFORTS TO IMPLEMENT AIR QUALITY PROGRAMS THROUGHOUT TRIBAL LANDS.
ACTIVITIES:
THE RECIPIENT WILL IMPLEMENT ACTIVITIES WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THE CLEAN AIR ACT SECTION 103 PROGRAM, INCLUDING: 1) BUILD TRIBAL CAPACITY TO ADDRESS A WIDE RANGE OF AIR QUALITY ISSUES, 2) IMPLEMENT AN INDOOR AIR QUALITY MONITORING AND EDUCATION PROGRAM,  3) CARRY OUT AN OUTREACH PROGRAM FOR THE TRIBAL COMMUNITY ON AIR QUALITY AND HEALTH IMPACTS, AND 4) DEVELOP AN EMISSIONS INVENTORY FOR TRIBAL LANDS.
OUTCOMES:
OUTCOMES INCLUDE INCREASED TRIBAL CAPACITY TO ADDRESS AIR QUALITY ISSUES AND IMPROVED AIR QUALITY ON TRIBAL LANDS. INTENDED BENEFICIARIES: DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM INCLUDE TRIBAL RESIDENTS, WHO WILL HAVE IMPROVED AIR QUALITY AND REDUCED LOCALIZED POLLUTION.
SUBRECIPIENT:
NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.

awards.recipient_name_raw: RED CLIFF BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA INDIANS OF WISCONSIN
awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THE PURPOSE OF THIS GRANT IS TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE RED CLIFF BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA IN ITS EFFORTS TO IMPLEMENT AIR QUALITY PROGRAMS THROUGHOUT TRIBAL LANDS.ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL IMPLEMENT ACTIVITIES WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THE CLEAN AIR ACT SECTION 103 PROGRAM, INCLUDING: 1) BUILD TRIBAL CAPACITY TO ADDRESS A WIDE RANGE OF AIR QUALITY ISSUES, 2) IMPLEMENT AN INDOOR AIR QUALITY ASSESSMENT AND EDUCATION PROGRAM, 3) CARRY OUT AN OUTREACH PROGRAM FOR THE TRIBAL COMMUNITY ON AIR QUALITY AND HEALTH IMPACTS, AND 4) DEVELOP A SOURCE AND EMISSIONS INVENTORY FOR TRIBAL LANDS.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:PRIMARY DELIVERABLES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE A SOURCE AND EMISSIONS INVENTORY AND DATA COLLECTION ON AMBIENT AND INDOOR AIR QUALITY TO HELP INFORM TRIBAL POLICY AND AIR QUALITY MANAGEMENT DECISIONS. OUTCOMES INCLUDE INCREASED TRIBAL AWARENESS AND CAPACITY TO ADDRESS AIR QUALITY ISSUES AND IMPROVED AIR QUALITY ON TRIBAL LANDS. INTENDED BENEFICIARIES: DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM INCLUDE TRIBAL RESIDENTS OF THE RED CLIFF BAND, WHO WILL HAVE IMPROVED AIR QUALITY AND REDUCED LOCALIZED POLLUTION.
